chart_description: This chart displays the rate of calls made to shared memory system calls per second. Shared Memory is a way of inter-process communication where processes share a segment of memory to exchange data.

dimension_descriptions.at: The rate of successful attaches (shmat) to shared memory segments.
dimension_descriptions.ctl: The rate of successful control (shmctl) calls on shared memory segments, such as changing permissions or removing the segment.
dimension_descriptions.dt: The rate of successful detaches (shmdt) from shared memory segments.
dimension_descriptions.get: The rate of successful retrievals (shmget) of shared memory segments.
